body.p: Which of the following best describes a D/A converter?

multiple_choice.choice: It takes in digital error numbers and converts them to alpha values.
It takes in decimal values and converts them to 1s and 0s.
It takes in digital IP addresses, preparing them for routing.
It takes in numeric samples and converts them to an analog signal.

response.feedback: A D/A converter takes in numbers, but not error numbers.
A D/A converter does not output 1s and 0s.
A D/A converter takes in numbers, but not IP address numbers.
A D/A converter takes in sample numbers and outputs an analog signal.
